attributes.action: Reduce university fees for 2020/21 due to lesser quality of education.
attributes.additional_details: The Government have a duty of care, in which reducing fees for students is the minimum action that can help in these difficult times. Online teaching will never equate to normal lectures before the pandemic. Mental health problems in students have rocketed hugely.
attributes.background: Education has been heavily disrupted due to the coronavirus pandemic. Yet students at universities are still made to produce the same quality of work. Reduce the 9k tuition fee to something more reasonable that reflects the education received in this time.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
